overview: Katherine Noesen has extensive management experience across diverse industries including digital media, wireless telecom, handheld devices, manufacturing, and consumer products. Katherine helped grow Website Pros, a service company focusing on the small business market, into a public company with 360 employees. She has a proven track record of developing and managing marketing initiatives and strategic partnerships for companies including Palm Computing and Philips Electronics. Katherine earned a BA in Economics from the University of North Carolina, Chapel Hill, where she was a Morehead Scholar. She was a Rotary International Scholar at the UniversitÃ© de Paris IV (La Sorbonne), and earned an MBA from the Stanford Graduate School of Business.
